name: Overture Music Visualization
description: Overture Music Visualization is an early-access music visualization experience for Windows, capturing audio in real-time from any source and creating effects that react to your music. It currently includes a stable desktop version, as well as a VR demo that supports the Oculus Rift.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 Storage: 13 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 2600K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 13 GB available space
